# SettingMetadata

**Structure**

Additional information about a configurable setting.

## Declaration

```swift
struct SettingMetadata<Value>
```

## Getting the Default

- **defaultValue**: The implicit value for a setting if your app doesn’t set a value.

## Accessing Metadata

- **BoundedSettingMetadata**: Additional information about a bounded setting.

items.description: The implicit value for a setting if your app doesn’t set a value.
items.name: defaultValue

items.description: Additional information about a bounded setting.
